title: President Joe Biden's son, Hunter Biden, is convicted of all 3 felonies in federal gun trial
creator: Randall Chase, Claudia Lauer, Michael Kunzelman, Colleen Long And Alanna Durkin Richer, The Associated Press
content: WILMINGTON, Del. (AP) — Hunter Biden was convicted Tuesday of all three felony charges related to the purchase of a revolver in 2018 when , prosecutors argued, the president’s son lied on a mandatory gun-purchase form by saying he was not illegally using or addicted to drugs. Jurors found Hunter Biden guilty of lying to a federally licensed gun dealer, making a false claim on the application by saying he was not a drug user and illegally having the gun for 11 days. The jury in Wilmington, Delaware, deliberated for about three hours over two days. Hunter Biden started straight ahead and showed little emotion as the verdict was read. After the verdict, he hugged both of his attorneys and smiled wanly. He kissed his wife, Melissa, and they left the courtroom together. First lady Jill Biden arrived at the courthouse minutes after the jury delivered its verdict and was not in the courtroom when it was read. Hunter Biden left the courthouse holding hands with the first lady and his wife....

title: اجرای زیرساخت‌ها عامل کاهش ۹ درصدی تلفات رانندگی درون شهری است
content: به گزارش ، سرهنگ رضا همتی‌زاده عصر سه شنبه در صحن علنی شورای شهر سنندج که با محور ساماندهی ترافیک و حل مشکل وانت‌بارهای میوه فروشی سطح شهر سنندج برگزار شد، اظهار کرد: شورا و شهر سنندج تعامل خوبی با پلیس راهنمایی و رانندگی آغاز کرده‌اند که تجربه آن را هرگز در گذشته شاهد نبوده‌ایم، امیدواریم این تعامل و همگرایی زمینه رفع مشکلات حوزه ترافیک شهری را فراهم آورد. وی خاطرنشان کرد: در طول یک سال اخیر اقدامات ارتقای فرهنگ ترافیکی، توجه به رفع نقاط حادثه خیز و اجرای زیرساخت‌ها موجب کاهش ۹ درصدی تلفات ناشی از تصادفات درون شهری شده است هر چند این روند تا به صفر رساندن تلفات تصادفات باید استمرار داشته باشد. وی با بیان اینکه پلیس راهنمایی رانندگی استان کارنامه خوبی در حوزه کاهش تلفات ناشی از تصادفات درون شهری در سطح استان داشته است، گفت: حضور در معابر و ترافیک تنها یکی از اقدامات پلیس راهنمایی رانندگی است و برخلاف آنچه مطرح شد به لحاظ نیروی انسانی کمبود نداریم. وی افزود: به لحاظ اقدامات و برنامه‌های مختلفی که در حوزه ترافیک اجرا شده استان کردستان جز چهار استان برتر کشور بوده است. همتی‌زاده با...

title: Neue Umfrage nach Europawahl: SPD gleichauf mit AfD – Hälfte der Befragten für Neuwahlen
creator: Felix Durach
content: Neue Umfrage nach Europawahl: SPD gleichauf mit AfD – Hälfte der Befragten für Neuwahlen Stand: 11.06.2024, 17:41 Uhr Von: Felix Durach Die Opposition fordert nach der Europawahl Kanzler Scholz zum Rücktritt auf. Eine neue Umfrage zeigt: auch große Teile der Bevölkerung wünschen sich Neuwahlen. München – Bei der Europawahl am Sonntag stieg die AfD erstmals bei einer bundesweiten Wahl zur zweitstärksten Kraft au f. Hinter den Unionsparteien, verzeichneten die Rechtspopulisten 15,9 Prozent der Stimmen – und lag damit vor den drei Parteien der aktuellen Regierungskoalition. Mit Blick auf die Bundestagswahl zeigt sich jedoch ein leicht anderes Bild. In der jüngsten Sonntagsfrage des Meinungsforschungsinstituts Forsa für RTL /ntv liegt die SPD gleich auf mit der AfD auf dem zweiten Rang. Sonntagsfrage nach der Europawahl – AfD und SPD bei Bundestagswahl gleichauf Die Sozialdemokraten um Kanzler Olaf Scholz verlieren einen Prozentpunkt und kommen auf 16 Prozent. Die AfD hingegen...

title: Arreola becomes second Wildcat to leave for Lone Star state in a month
creator: Hobbs News-Sun
content: Texas two-step: Arreola becomes second Wildcat to leave for Lone Star state in a month PETER STEIN/NEWS-SUN Robert Arreola is a sports-minded guy, a football and baseball guy, it’s in his blood, his DNA. So if Arreola is involved in sports, particularly football and baseball, the where doesn’t really matter, only the what. Wherever he’s doing it, Arreola is doing what he loves. That makes Arreola’s move to Denver City, though surprising, fathomable at the same time. Arreola – a 1987 Lovington High graduate who was part of a 1986 state championship as a football player, served four separate stints as Wildcats head baseball coach, and spent almost a decade as the school’s athletic director – will do what he loves at Denver City High. He will serve as the Mustangs’ head baseball coach and as an assistant football coach, beginning in the 2024-25 school year. Arreola becomes the second Wildcat to leave for a Texas school in the past month. Anthony Gonzales stepped down as Lovington’s head...

title: I to se desilo u Americi: 'Prvi sin', Hunter Biden, proglašen krivim, tri bivše svjedočile protiv njega
content: Hunter Biden (54), sin američkog predsjednika Joea Bidena , proglašen je krivim po svim točkama optužnice na suđenju za oružje i sada mu prijeti 25 godina zatvora. Proglašen je krivim po tri točke optužnice: dvije točke za davanje lažnih izjava i jednu točku za ilegalno posjedovanje oružja, piše BBC . O turbulentnom Hunterovom životu slušalo se u federalnoj sudnici. Brojni svjedoci pričali su o njegovoj ovisnosti o drogama, koja je izmakla kontroli nakon smrti brata Beaua 2015. godine. Porota od 12 članova u Wilmingtonu, Delaware, osudila je Huntera, koji je odlučio ne svjedočiti u svoju obranu, po svim optužbama u utorak nakon gotovo pet sati vijećanja. Savezni tužitelji rekli su da je Hunter 12. listopada 2018. ušao u trgovinu u Wilmingtonu i kupio revolver Colt Cobra. Na pitanje u obrascu, koji se prema zakonu mora ispuniti, je li ovisan o drogama, napisao je - ne. "Optuženi je znao da koristi crack i da je bio ovisan o cracku u tom razdoblju", rekao je...

title: Прибалтика окончательно отключится от российской энергосистемы 9 февраля
content: Эстония, Латвия и Литва отключат свою электроэнергетическую систему от общей системы с Россией и Белоруссией (БРЭЛЛ) 8 февраля, а с 9 февраля возобновят работу в континентальной европейской электросети, сообщает ERR. Процесс десинхронизации, который длится уже почти 20 лет, завершится в начале августа, когда операторы энергосистем Эстонии, Латвии и Литвы сообщат России и Белоруссии, что больше не желают оставаться в общей синхронной зоне на новый годовой период, начинающийся 8 февраля, пояснил заместитель госсекретаря по энергетике и минеральным ресурсам министерства климата Эстонии Яанус Уйга. Руководитель сектора энергетических рынков в министерстве климата Эстонии Карин Мария Лехтметс добавила, что подключение к континентальной европейской электросети будет осуществляться через литовско-польское соединение. Председатель правления эстонского оператора электросетей Elering Калле Килк заявил, что к этому времени три прибалтийские страны завершат подготовку к...

title: Ecologistas en Acción concede su premio Atila a la Fundación Ingenio y Vox
content: La organización Ecologistas en Acción ya ha hecho públicos los premios Atila que otorga cada año en el marco del Día Mundial del Medio Ambiente, que se celebró el 5 de junio. Aunque la semana pasada anunció las distinciones nacionales, este martes ha dado a conocer los elegidos a nivel regional. El objetivo de los premios es «distinguir y denunciar a aquellas personas, entidades o proyectos que más hayan destacado por su contribución a la destrucción del medio ambiente». En la categoría principal, el premio Atila regional fue compartido para la Fundación Ingenio y Vox. En el primer caso, por «representar los intereses de la agroindustria del Campo de Cartagena» y por «contratar 'expertos' que sitúen el foco [de los problemas del Mar Menor] en los vertidos urbanos (minoritarios) para quitar el foco de la agricultura y ganadería intensivas (verdaderos orígenes)». En cuanto al partido, Ecologistas en Acción critica que dedica «mucho esfuerzo y dinero a una campaña...

title: Huge boost for England ahead of Euro 2024 opener as key star spotted in training
creator: Darren Looney
content: The left-back has been Southgate’s first choice for the role ever since taking over the England national team but his inclusion in the Euro 2024 squad surprised many due to his fitness issues and lack of playing time through the current campaign. Shaw hasn’t featured for Man United since picking up a hamstring injury in February and the defender didn’t participate in any of England’s two warm-up games. It is uncertain what condition the 28-year-old will be in for the tournament, but the Three Lions received a boost on Tuesday as the Man United star took part in training with the rest of the squad, reports . All 26 players in England’s squad participated in an open training session in Germany on Tuesday as they prepare for their Group C opener against Serbia at the weekend. Will Luke Shaw feature in England’s opening game against Serbia? Shaw is unlikely to start against Serbia on Sunday as the left-back will be lacking match fitness having been out of action for so long. Southgate...

title: ‘The people you murdered expected you to protect them’: Cop handed three life terms
creator: Nokwanda Ncwane
content: Constable Sizwe Cedrick Khoza, a cop arrested by the Independent Police Investigative Directorate (Ipid) for killing three family members, was sentenced to three life terms. The 38-year-old was s entenced for killing his wife, her sister, and her brother in Sand River Trust, Hazyview, in Mpumalanga on 30 April 2023. COP HANDED THREE LIFE TERMS FOR MURDER In a joint statement, the National Prosecuting Authority (NPA) and the Ipid said evidence before the court is that Khoza and his wife, Nomthandazo Suzan Mnisi, 31, had marital problems, and he called a meeting with the wife’s family to assist them. During the meeting, an argument ensued. Suzan’s brother called Khoza a small boy, which angered him. Khoza then went to his bedroom, took out his service firearm, and went to the sitting room to show them what a small boy can do. He fatally shot his wife, her sister Colisile Mnisi, 32, a nurse at Matikwana Hospital, and her brother, Dennis Mkhatshwa, 42. The incident was reported to Ipid,...

title: Long queues building on M62 in Warrington due to 'police incident'
content: The incident is currently happening on M62 eastbound from junction 11, Birchwood, to junction 12, Eccles. Two lanes are closed and traffic is heavy. Cheshire Police has been contacted for comment.

title: President Joe Biden's son, Hunter Biden, is convicted of all 3 felonies in federal gun trial
creator: RANDALL CHASE, CLAUDIA LAUER, MICHAEL KUNZELMAN, COLLEEN LONG and ALANNA DURKIN RICHER
content: WILMINGTON, Del. — Hunter Biden was convicted Tuesday of all three felony charges related to the purchase of a revolver in 2018 when, prosecutors argued, the president's son lied on a mandatory gun-purchase form by saying he was not illegally using or addicted to drugs. Jurors found Hunter Biden guilty of lying to a federally licensed gun dealer, making a false claim on the application by saying he was not a drug user and illegally having the gun for 11 days. The jury in Wilmington, Delaware, deliberated for about three hours over two days. Hunter Biden started straight ahead and showed little emotion as the verdict was read. After the verdict, he hugged both of his attorneys and smiled wanly. He kissed his wife, Melissa, and they left the courtroom together. First lady Jill Biden arrived at the courthouse minutes after the jury delivered its verdict and was not in the courtroom when it was read. Hunter Biden left the courthouse holding hands with the first lady and his wife. They did...

title: More than 10,000 Southern Baptists gather for meeting that could bar churches with women pastors
creator: Peter Smith, The Associated Press
content: INDIANAPOLIS (AP) — More than 10,000 voting representatives gathered Tuesday for the opening of the Southern Baptist Convention's two-day annual meeting , where they will vote on whether to ban churches with women pastors and deliberate yet again on how to respond to sexual abuse within churches. Some 10,553 messengers, as delegates are known, are meeting in Indianapolis. On Wednesday, they are expected to debate whether to amend their constitution to ban churches with any women pastors — from lead to associate roles. The measure received preliminary approval last year. Early Tuesday, a small group of women stood outside the Indiana Convention Center in a low-key demonstration in support of women in ministry. “I hope that people know women have equal value and can be pastors,” said the Rev. Meredith Stone, executive director of Baptist Women in Ministry, an organization that originated within the SBC in the 1980s, but it now works with women in a variety of Baptist denominations....

title: Ένοχος ο γιος του Τζο Μπάιντεν για 3 κακουργήματα
creator: news@dnews.gr (Newsroom)
content: Δικαστήριο στο Ντέλαγουεαρ έκρινε ένοχο τον γιο του Τζο Μπάιντεν , Χάντερ και για τις τρεις κακουργηματικές κατηγορίες εναντίον του για οπλοκατοχή. Ομοσπονδιακό δικαστήριο του Γουίλμινγκτον απήγγειλε κατηγορίες στον Χάντερ Μπάιντεν για οπλοκατοχή την εποχή που έκανε χρήση ναρκωτικών. Δύο από τις κατηγορίες επιφέρουν μάξιμουμ 10 χρόνια ποινή φυλάκισης, ενώ η τρίτη μάξιμουμ 5 χρόνια. Κάθε μία ωστόσο από τις κατηγορίες εναντίον του επιφέρουν και πρόστιμο της τάξης των 250.000 δολ. Για μέρες οι κατήγοροι παρουσίαζαν αποδείξεις που υποδείκνυαν ότι ο Μπάιντεν ήταν εθισμένος όταν αγόρασε όπλο στο Ντέλαγουεαρ. Η υπερασπιστική του ομάδα είπε ότι ήταν σε διαδικασία απεξάρτησης τότε και όχι χρήστης. Ο ίδιος ο Χάντερ Μπάιντεν δεν κατέθεσε και α/ρνήθηκε και τις 3 κατηγορίες εναντίον του. {https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdDY8_4bhyo}

title: "Non sono del tutto me stessa”, la premier danese rilascia la prima intervista dopo l'attacco
Final Fantasy 14's Yoshi-P says Dawntrail will finally return "more individuality" to the MMO's jobs, admitting "we're not in a good situation for that" after years of over-simplification
content: As the Final Fantasy 14 community expresses concern about the oversimplification of jobs, director Yoshi-P reveals that he's aware - and that yes, 's future updates will remedy this. While attending the recent event, GamesRadar+ spoke to director and producer Naoki 'Yoshi-P' Yoshida regarding controversial job changes like the removal of Kaiten from Samurai's rotation in 6.1. Among the MMO's fanbase, there have long been concerns now about classes becoming too simple - with SAM being just one of many. For example, one poll asking players whether they're worried about Dawntrail further contributing to the "oversimplification of jobs" revealed that largely, the community is indeed afraid. From the various changes made to Astrologian's card and sect systems (much to my own dismay) to DPS class ability nerfs some fans remark that they "don't think it's possible for them to make jobs any simpler than they are." Thankfully, Yoshi-P is well aware of this sentiment, as is the rest of the...

title: Επιλογή Αναστασίου το 2019, επιλογή Αναστασίου το 2024
creator: Andreas Christou
content: Ελληνικό μπόλιασμα στο δεξί άκρο της αμυντικής γραμμής της ΟΜΟΝΟΙΑΣ μετά από 5 χρόνια περίπου. Ο Γιάννης Μασούρας έρχεται στην Κύπρο για να φορέσει τριφύλλι και να υπογράψει συμβόλαιο για να αποτελέσει τη μια από τις δύο επιλογές στα δεξιά μπακ. Σε κάποιους έκανε γκελ το όνομα, σε άλλους όχι, όμως πάντα πρέπει να περιμένουμε να δούμε τι θα κάνει στο γήπεδο. Είναι σίγουρα μια επιλογή του Αναστασίου, ο οποίος τον ξέρει καλά αφού είχαν συνεργαστεί την περασμένη σεζόν στην Κηφισιά. Ο προηγούμενος Ελλαδίτης δεξιός μπακ που είχε έρθει στην Κύπρο για την ΟΜΟΝΟΙΑ ήταν ο Χάρης Μαυρίας. Επιλογή και πάλι του Αναστασίου τότε με τον Μαυρία να κάνει πολύ καλές εμφανίσεις τον πρώτο ενάμιση χρόνο της παρουσίας του στην ΟΜΟΝΟΙΑ. Από τον Ιανουάριο του 2019 μέχρι το καλοκαίρι του 2020 (τη σεζόν που διακόπηκε το πρωτάθλημα) μέτρησε 40 συμμετοχές με 3 γκολ και 1 ασίστ. Τη σεζόν του πρωταθλήματος έχασε τη θέση του στην...

title: خدمت به کشور مصداق جهاد در راه خدا است/شهید رئیسی شاخص خدمت
content: به گزارش ، حجت الاسلام امین رضا کمالی ظهر سه شنبه در نشست بصیرتی سیاسی در جمع کارکنان ناحیه مقاومت بسیج سپاه درمیان گفت: شهید آیت الله رئیسی عمر خود را در خدمت به مردم ایران اسلامی سپری کرد و در عمر کوتاه خدمت خود در ریاست جمهوری اقدامات و خدمات بسیار ارزشمندی را در عرصه داخلی و خارجی برای کشور به ارمغان آورد. مسئول نمایندگی ولی فقیه در سپاه انصارالرضا (ع) اظهار کرد: انشاالله همگان مسیر این شهیدان عزیز را که مسیر خدمت به نظام اسلامی هست ادامه دهیم و نگذاریم پرچم خدمت به ایران اسلامی بر زمین بماند. کمالی بیان کرد: امروز قرار گرفتن در میدان خدمت، زمینه‌سازی برای ظهور امام زمان (عج) است که تحقق این مهم نیاز به کادرسازی دارد. مسئول نمایندگی ولی فقیه در سپاه انصارالرضا (ع) گفت: اعتقاد به مبانی دین‌مبین اسلام از الزامات حکومت امام زمان (عج) است و بایستی فرهنگ اصلی اسلام که فرهنگ توحیدی و باور به خداوند متعال در وجود همه ما انسان‌ها باید نهادینه شود. وی : امروز دشمنان اسلام با پهن کردن تله‌های انحرافی گفتمانی به دنبال این هستند که پرچم امام زمان (عج) را بر زمین بیندازند و مانع از تحقق...

title: La Junta Electoral rechaza la denuncia del PSOE contra Hazte Oír por atacar a Pedro Sánchez y Begoña Gómez en campaña
content: Considera que está amparado en la libertad de expresión al no pedir el voto para ningún partido La plataforma ultraconservadora puso la cara de ambos en dos cerdos revolcándose en el barro Dos días después de las elecciones europeas, la Junta Electoral Provincial de Madrid ha desestimado la denuncia del PSOE contra la plataforma ultraconservadora Hazte Oír por una campaña de publicidad dirigida contra el presidente del Gobierno, Pedro Sánchez , y contra su mujer, Begoña Gómez. Los socialistas, que aseguran que la campaña tenía como "finalidad absolutamente evidente" el perjudicarles "electoralmente", se encuentran de esta forma con la desestimación de su denuncia por interferencia en los comicios porque, entre otras cosas, Hazte Oír no pedía el voto para ningún otro partido . title: Суд в Москве продлил арест блогеру Шабутдинову еще на два месяца
content: Таганский районный суд Москвы продлил на два месяца срок ареста блогера, совладельца бизнес-школы «Like центр» Аяза Шабутдинова, обвиняемого в мошенничестве в особо крупном размере. Об этом сообщается в Telegram-канале столичных судов общей юрисдикции. Шабутдинов пробудет под стражей до 16 августа. Блогер находится в СИЗО с 4 ноября 2023 г. Его обвиняют в 50 эпизодах мошенничества. Следствие полагает, что предприниматель совместно с соучастниками, действуя от имени подконтрольных юридических лиц, в том числе «Like центр», создавал у граждан ложное впечатление о возможности ведения бизнеса и получения высокого дохода благодаря образовательным программам, что не соответствовало действительности. 4 апреля районный суд также наложил арест на денежные средства, находящиеся на лицевых счетах и изъятые в ходе обыска, и принадлежащий Шабутдинову транспорт. 18 апреля защита Шабутдинова обжаловала решение Таганского районного суда Москвы о продлении меры пресечения в виде заключения...

title: طلاب كلية دبي للسياحة يحصدون جوائز «كولينير الإمارات 2024»
creator: دبي - البيان
content: المصدر: دبي - البيان التاريخ: 11 يونيو 2024 ت + ت - الحجم الطبيعي حصدت كلية دبي للسياحة، إحدى مؤسسات دائرة الاقتصاد والسياحة بدبي 3 جوائز، فيما فاز طلابها من برنامج فنون الطهي بـ19 ميدالية خلال الدورة السابعة والعشرين من مسابقة «صالون كولينير الإمارات»، التي أقيمت فعالياتها بين 20 و22 مايو ضمن معرض «إكسبو كولينير» في مركز إكسبو الشارقة. وتشكل هذه المسابقة الفعالية الأضخم لفنون الطهي في منطقة الشرق الأوسط، وتُقام تحت رعاية الرابطة العالمية لجمعيات الطهاة. وشارك فريق كلية دبي للسياحة في المسابقة تحت إشراف مجموعة من مدربي فنون الطهي البارزين، ومنهم كريستين بيسبروك، وجيرارد جراندانو، وسالي هاندوكو، وحصد طلاب برنامج فنون الطهي في الكلية سبع ميداليات ذهبية، وأربعاً فضية، وثماني برونزية، وجائزتي استحقاق، بالإضافة إلى ثلاث جوائز كبرى. وفازت إيثار شولاك، من المملكة العربية السعودية المقيمة في دبي منذ 13 عاماً، بجائزة أفضل طاهٍ شاب لعام 2024، كما تم تكريم زميلتها نشيطة نزار بجائزة أفضل طاهٍ طالب لعام 2024. وبالإضافة إلى الجوائز الفردية، حازت كلية دبي للسياحة جائزة...

title: Mexico-based landlord tops the latest Revenue tax defaulters list
creator: Irishexaminer.com
content: A Mexico-based landlord topped Revenue’s tax defaulters list for the first three months of the year. Christian Carter of Iztacalco Mexico City racked up settlements of almost €1m, including around €246m interest and just over €300,000 in penalties. Mr Carter was investigated by Revenue Commissioners for under-declaration of income tax. He has more than €873,000 outstanding from his total of €951,029 in settlements. In second place on the list is a Tipperary-based car dealership. Clonmel Auto Sales was subject to a Revenue audit case for under-declaration of Vat. Settlements in this case reached €560,000. The business operator with the third highest settlements in this period is Mieczyslaw Antkiewicz, director of Dublin-based Polartrans. Settlements in this Revenue audit case exceeded more than €541,000. In this instance, Revenue found there was an under-declaration of PRSI, PAYE, USC and Vat. All cases that made it onto the list had settlements in excess of €100,000 but around half,...

title: Mesterséges intelligencia: mit fogunk csinálni, ha a munkák hetven százalékát helyettesíti
content: A mesterséges intelligencia (MI) gyors növekedése miatt 300 millió munkahely van veszélyben, de vajon mit lehet tenni, hogy ne a miénk szűnjön meg. Erre és hasonló kérdésekre kereste a választ kedden a Lurdy Rendezvényközpontban a MIExpo . A résztvevők arra vállalkoztak, hogy kkv-k számára szakértők segítségével megoldásokat mutassanak a mesterséges intelligencia alkalmazására. Jelentős érdeklődés övezte a délelőtti nyitó előadásokat, ahol magáról az MI jelenéről és lehetséges trendjeiről beszéltek az előadók. Azért csak lehetséges trendekről, mert ahogy a ChatGPT megjelenését sem tudták megjósolni a jövőkutatók, úgy az MI exponenciális fejlődése is egyik napról a másikra korábban elképzelhetetlen megoldásokkal állhat elő. VIDÉO. "Arrêtez de faire chier les Français" : Michel Sardou sans filtre au lendemain de la dissolution de l’Assemblée nationale
content: À l’occasion de l’avant-première du film retraçant sa tournée d’adieu, Michel Sardou était présent ce lundi 10 juin 2024 au Pathé Wepler. Devant le public parisien, il en a profité pour faire une nouvelle sortie médiatique remarquée. Michel Sardou était convié au Pathé Wepler avant la diffusion du long-métrage retraçant son ultime tournée. Connu pour ses prises de paroles clivantes, le chanteur n’a pas hésité à répondre avec ironie à une blague sur la politique, alors que la France traverse une période inédite. L’artiste de 77 ans a été longuement applaudi par son public avant la diffusion du long-métrage dédié à sa fin de carrière. Comme le cite 20 Minutes , certains ont profité de ce moment d’euphorie pour réclamer un nouvel Olympia à leur chanteur favori. "En 2029 t’auras rien du tout. Je serai Premier ministre ou rien" , a répondu le principal intéressé. Une phrase qui a directement fait réagir les spectateurs, scandant par la suite "Michel...

title: Invitan al conversatorio de clausura de la exposición «Flor Garduño» en Veracruz
creator: Héctor González
content: La Secretaría de Cultura de Veracruz, a través de la Fototeca de Veracruz, invitó al conversatorio de clausura de la exposición «Flor Garduño. La construcción del instante», colección promovida por Fomento Cultural Citibanamex, A.C. El diálogo tendrá lugar el viernes 14 de junio a las 18:00 horas con la participación de Flor Garduño y el fotógrafo Adrián Mendieta. La exposición «Flor Garduño. La construcción del instante» presenta un total de 69 fotografías que reflejan más de tres décadas de trabajo de una de las fotógrafas mexicanas más destacadas a nivel internacional. La Fototeca de Veracruz despide esta muestra retrospectiva con un conversatorio entre la destacada artista visual Flor Garduño y el reconocido fotógrafo Adrián Mendieta. Flor Garduño, quien fuera alumna de Kati Horna y Manuel Álvarez Bravo, ha desarrollado su propio estilo aventurándose en la naturaleza quieta, el desnudo femenino, el retrato, la arquitectura, el espacio y el paisaje de los...

title: Hunter Biden es culpable de tres cargos por manejo ilegal de armas
creator: Jesús García
content: Un jurado halló culpable a Hunter Biden de tres delitos federales por el manejo ilegal de armas, debido a que leyes impiden que personas adictas a las drogas manejen este tipo de equipo. El hijo del presidente Joe Biden enfrentará una sentencia de hasta 25 años de prisión, pero es el primer familiar directo de un mandatario en funciones hallado culpable por un delito federal. El presidente Biden dijo que, de ser hallado culpable, no perdonaría a su hijo Hunter por las acusaciones que enfrenta. Además de la sentencia, Hunter Biden podría tener una multa de hasta $750,000 dólares.

title: Belinda reacciona al noviazgo de Christian Nodal y Ángela Aguilar, pero después borra el mensaje
creator: Clary Castro
content: Poquito tiempo duró el mensaje de Belinda en sus historias de Instagram , pero la cantante y actriz no dudó en tomar las redes para reaccionar al nuevo romance de Ángela Aguilar con Christian Nodal . “Tarde o temprano todo cae por su propio peso”, escribió la protagonista de “Edén”. Christian Nodal habla a corazón abierto sobre su relación con Belinda: “ya entendí que nunca más volver a hacer” Las palabras de Belinda resuenan mucho, porque ayer después de esta noticia que impactó al mundo artístico a nivel internacional, muchos empezaron a ver a la actriz de origen español, con otros ojos. Y en las redes sociales hubo quienes incluso comentaban que tal vez Belinda siempre tuvo razón, y que ella tal vez fue víctima de Nodal y no necesariamente al revés. El mensaje de la actriz ya no está vigente. Pero nosotros logramos encontrarlo circulando en varias plataformas digitales que a tiempo llegaron a realizar la captura. Pero qué dice Nodal, qué dice Ángela Aguilar Todo...

title: Újabb furcsaságok derültek ki a főpolgármester-választásról
content: A szavazólapról való kihúzás módja érdemben befolyásolhatta a leadott főpolgármesteri szavazatokat. – Mérnök vagyok és közgazdász. Látva a számokat, hogy a budapesti átlaghoz képest Újpesten másfélszer annyi az érvénytelen szavazat, akkor logikusan felmerül a kérdés, és fel is kell tenni, hogy ez hogyan lehet? – írta közösségi oldalán Wintermantel Zsolt. Már a választás napján bemutattam, hogy nálunk, alig látható módon, félig kifogyó tűfilcekkel húzták ki Szentkirályi Alexandra nevét a szavazólapon, pedig máshol találtak rá jó és hatékony megoldást. A szavazóköri delegáltjaink tömegesen számoltak be arról, hogy nagyon sok olyan szavazólap volt, ahol csak Szentkirályi Alexandra volt beikszelve, ami érvénytelen szavazat – emelte ki a politikus, majd hozzátette: ki kell jelenteni, hogy a szavazólapról való kihúzás módja érdemben befolyásolta az Újpesten leadott főpolgármesteri szavazatokat. – Közfeladatot...

title: How one of the most prolific board game designers made it: "The idea of mass market 'being simple' is bullshit"
creator: benjamin.abbott@futurenet.com (Benjamin Abbott)
content: Eric M. Lang has basically seen it all when it comes to board game design. With literal decades of experience and countless projects under his belt, the Canadian defines 'prolific.' In fact, he's created so many different systems that it can be hard to keep track of what he's worked on. There's one thing he still vehement about after all these years, though – that the don't get that way by being dumbed down. "I've always had this sort of ambition to recreate that [Dungeons & Dragons] moment, when I first played D&D," Lang tells me when we catch up at 2024's UK Games Expo. "It changed my life. It gave me the idea of 'oh my God, games can be so much more.' They can be bigger than the box – they're a lifestyle." Lang thinks he may finally have cracked that ambition... and with a game he always thought was impossible. "What do you got?" If Lang had an origin story, it'd start with what he describes as "bad" games. At five or six, he used to play mass-market board games with his...

title: Hunter Biden, el hijo de Joe Biden, declarado culpable de tres cargos graves por posesión de armas
Odisha: मनोनीत मुख्यमंत्री मोहन चरण माझी के घर पर मनाया गया जश्न, VIDEO...
creator: Harrison
content: भुवनेश्वर: ओडिशा के मनोनीत मुख्यमंत्री मोहन चरण माझी के घर पर जश्न मनाया गया। भाजपा विधायक मोहन चरण माझी ओडिशा के नए मुख्यमंत्री होंगे। कनक वर्धन सिंह देव और प्रवाती परिदा उपमुख्यमंत्री होंगे।मंगलवार को हुई बैठक में माझी को ओडिशा में भाजपा विधायक दल का नेता चुना गया । पार्टी के नवनिर्वाचित विधायकों की बैठक के बाद रक्षा मंत्री राजनाथ सिंह ने इस फैसले की घोषणा की। कनक वर्धन सिंह देव Kanak Vardhan Singh Deo और प्रवती परिदा उपमुख्यमंत्री होंगे। लोकसभा चुनावों के साथ-साथ हुए विधानसभा चुनावों में बहुमत मिलने के बाद भाजपा ओडिशा Odisha में अपनी पहली सरकार बनाएगी । विधायकों की बैठक के लिए पार्टी के केंद्रीय पर्यवेक्षक के तौर पर राजनाथ सिंह और केंद्रीय मंत्री भूपेंद्र यादव राज्य की राजधानी में थे। भाजपा ने ओडिशा विधानसभा की 147 में से 78 सीटें जीतीं।

title: House of the Dragon season 2 showrunner doesn't feel the pressure of following the controversial Game of Thrones season 8: "Our challenge comes from within"
creator: molly.edwards@futurenet.com (Molly Edwards)
content: has garnered ahead of its release, cementing Westeros' comeback story after the controversial finale. When we sat down with showrunner Ryan Condal to discuss the upcoming new season of House of the Dragon, we asked whether the conversation surrounding the prequel series as a redemption for the original show and its much-discussed finale is ever something that's on his mind. "We're our own story," he says. "Myself and all of the creative people that make the show, the team of writers around me, and for that matter: our challenge comes from within. And we know that, now that we've made this series that people have really engaged with, the expectation will just keep getting higher and higher to keep topping ourselves and delivering more unexpected twists and turns as we go along, and also a very satisfying character story. All that pressure is quite enough, for me and for us. And that's also the thing that we can control to an extent, is how well we do internally on delivering on...

title: Prekybininkai ruošiasi draudimui eksponuoti tabako gaminius – išbando automatizuotus sprendimus
content: Pagal pernai Seimo priimtas Tabako, tabako gaminių ir su jais susijusių gaminių kontrolės įstatymo pataisas, nuo 2025 metų sausio 1 dienos Lietuvos parduotuvėse nebebus galima viešai eksponuoti tabako gaminių ir jų aksesuarų – bus leidžiama tik nurodyti rūkalų pavadinimus ir jų kainas. Taip pat įteisinta specializuotų tabako gaminių parduotuvių ir skyrių veikla. Kaip šiems pokyčiams ruošiasi prekybininkai ir kokie sprendimai naudojami užsienio šalyse, kuriose tokia tvarka jau galioja? Panašūs draudimai taikomi ir kitose šalyse Narkotikų, tabako ir alkoholio kontrolės departamento (NTAKD) laikinoji direktorė Gražina Belian sako, kad Lietuva nėra pirmoji šalis, kurioje bus draudžiama prekybos vietose eksponuoti tabako gaminius. Panašus reguliavimas taikomas Danijoje, Norvegijoje, Suomijoje, Islandijoje, Slovėnijoje, Kroatijoje, Sakartvele, Naujojoje Zelandijoje ir kitose šalyse. „Jose tabako gaminiai prekybos vietose neeksponuojami, o tik...

creator: اليوم ـ الرياض
content: تحدث سيرجي سافيتش نجم نادي الهلال، على بكاء كريستيانو رونالدو في المباراة النهائية لمسابقة كأس الملك، والتي حقق الفريق فيها الانتصار بركلات الجزاء الترجيحية. googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1608041226765-0'); }); وقال سيرجي سافيتش في تصريحات إعلامية:" أن كريستيانو رونالدو لاعب عظيم، وهذا الأمر واضح بالنسبة للجميع، منذ سنوات طويلة، وهو يقدم مستويات كبيرة، لاعب لديه احترافية كبيرة للغاية، ويعمل دائما على الظهور بأفضل شكل". أخبار متعلقة عاجل: الهلال يتوج ببطولة كأس خادم الحرمين الشريفين على النصر ميتروفيتش يمنح الأفضلية لـ الهلال في الشوط الأول أمام النصر جيسوس يعلن تشكيل الهلال أمام النصر.. الفرج بديل سافيتش وتابع:" كريستيانو رونالدو، لا يحب الخسارة نهائيا، ولم اتفاجئ من بكاءه خلال الفترة الماضية، مشيراً إلى أن يكره الخسارة، ودائما أتمني له الأفضل". وواصل:" ميتروفيتش لاعب عظيم، وبالتأكيد سهل علينا الأمر خلال الفترة الأخيرة، مشيراً إلى أن كافة الأمور رائعة للغاية داخل النادي". وشهدت الفترة الأخيرة، بكاء من جانب كريستيانو رونالدو،...

title: Football: पोलैंड के कप्तान रॉबर्ट लेवांडोव्स्की चोट के कारण शुरुआती मैच से बाहर
creator: Ayush Kumar
content: Football: पोलैंड के कप्तान रॉबर्ट लेवांडोव्स्की जांघ की चोट के कारण इस सप्ताहांत नीदरलैंड के खिलाफ यूरो 2024 के पहले मैच में नहीं खेल पाएंगे, पोलिश फुटबॉल महासंघ के डॉक्टर ने मंगलवार को यह घोषणा की। 35 वर्षीय लेवांडोव्स्की को सोमवार को तुर्की पर पोलैंड की 2-1 की मैत्रीपूर्ण जीत के दौरान चोट लगी थी। बार्सिलोना के इस शानदार फॉरवर्ड को सिर्फ़ 33 मिनट के बाद मैदान छोड़ना पड़ा, जिससे उनका 150वां अंतरराष्ट्रीय मैच छोटा हो गया। इस झटके के बावजूद, पोलिश टीम ने जीत हासिल कर यूरो 2024 की अपनी तैयारियों को पूरा किया। पोलैंड को 16 जून को नीदरलैंड का सामना करना है, उसके बाद 21 जून को ऑस्ट्रिया और 25 जून को टूर्नामेंट के पसंदीदा फ्रांस के खिलाफ़ अहम मैच खेलने हैं। पोलिश टीम के डॉक्टर, जैक जारोज़ेव्स्की ने उम्मीद जताई कि लेवांडोव्स्की ऑस्ट्रिया के खिलाफ़ दूसरे ग्रुप स्टेज मैच के लिए वापसी कर सकते हैं। जारोज़ेव्स्की ने कहा, "हम हर संभव कोशिश कर रहे हैं ताकि रॉबर्ट ऑस्ट्रिया के खिलाफ़ दूसरे मैच में खेल सकें।" शुरुआत में, पोलैंड के कोच मिशल प्रोबिएर्ज़ ने लेवांडोव्स्की की चोट की गंभीरता को कम करके आंका...

title: Borelj se požalio: Ne smatraju sve zemlje EU Rusiju „egzistencijalnom prijetnjom”
creator: urednik
content: Ne smatraju sve zemlje Evropske unije Rusiju „egzistencijalnom prijetnjom”, izjavio je šef evropske diplomatije Žozep Borelj. „Sada svi shvataju da je Rusija egzistencijalna prijetnja. Odnosno, ne, ne svi. Neki kažu da Moskva nije prijetnja po njih”, rekao je on u govoru na godišnjoj analitičkoj konferenciji o bezbjednosnim pitanjima u Briselu. On je takođe istakao da se EU iz unije, zasnovane na interesima zajedničke ekonomije, postepeno pretvara u zajednicu utemeljenu na zajedničkim bezbjednosnim interesima.

title: مسؤولون مغاربة لـ«الخليج»: نسترشد بتجربة دبي
creator: دار الخليج
content: أكد مسؤولون حكوميون في المغرب، عمق العلاقات الاستراتيجية التي تجمع ين المغرب ودولة الإمارات في شتى المجالات الاقتصادية والاستثمارية والثقافية والاجتماعية وغيرها، وأن الطريق إلى المزيد من التعاون مملوء بالفرص والنجاحات المشتركة. وأوضحوا، في تصريحات خاصة ل«الخليج»، على هامش ملتقى بعثة غرف دبي العالمية إلى الدار البيضاء، أن البيئة الاستثمارية في المغرب خصبة للشركات الإماراتية، الأمر الذي يمكّن البلدين في القطاعين العام والخاص من الدخول في شراكات مستقبلية واعدة. وأشاروا إلى نجاح تجربة دبي مركزاً مالياً وتجارياً عالمياً، وأن قطاعات الأعمال في المغرب حريصة على توطيد أواصر التعاون المشترك مع شركات دبي، والاستفادة من تجربتها في السوق المغربي، خاصة أن المملكة المغربية مقبلة على العديد من الأحداث الدولية الضخمة، مثل استضافة كأس العالم 2030، والأمم الإفريقية 2025، وهو يفتح المزيد من الآفاق للعمل الثنائي البناء. أشار حسان بركاني، رئيس غرفة التجارة والصناعة والخدمات في الدار البيضاء، إلى أهمية العلاقات الأخوية التي تجمع بين المغرب والإمارات منذ عقود. وأشار إلى أن...

title: Meriahkan HUT Jakarta, LRT Berlakukan Tarif Rp 1 Selama 2 Hari, Catat Tanggalnya
content: jpnn.com , JAKARTA - PT LRT Jakarta turut ikut memeriahkan Hari Ulang Tahun (HUT) Ke-497 Jakarta dengan cara memberlakukan tarif khusus Rp 1 selama dua hari, yakni 22-23 Juni 2024. “Pemberlakuan tarif ini mulai pukul 05.30 hingga 23.00 WIB pada 22 Juni dan 23 Juni 2024," kata Pelaksana Tugas (Plt) Kepala Divisi Sekretaris Perusahaan Aris Rizal Arafah di Jakarta, Selasa. Ia mengatakan, LRT Jakarta turut memberlakukan tarif khusus hanya Rp1 sesuai dengan Keputusan Kepala Dinas Perhubungan Provinsi DKI Jakarta Nomor e-0051 Tahun 2024. Pada perayaan HUT Kota Jakarta tahun 2023, LRT Jakarta mencatat lebih dari 6.100 penumpang menikmati tarif Rp1 yang diberlakukan dalam perayaan saat itu. Pada tahun ini, LRT Jakarta optimis jumlah penumpang akan meningkat dan dengan adanya penerapan tarif Rp1 dalam dua hari pelaksanaan. “LRT Jakarta berharap dapat memberikan kontribusi nyata mendukung program pemerintah untuk semakin memanfaatkan transportasi publik sebagai alat mobilisasi serta hal ini...

title: Funerale con bandiera nazista e saluti romani, chiesto processo per otto militanti
content: Violazione delle leggi Scelba e Mancino. La procura di Roma ha chiesto il processo per otto esponenti di estrema destra che il 10 gennaio 2022 esposero sulla bara di Alessia Augello, di cui si celebrava il funerale nella chiesa di Santa Lucia, a circonvallazione Clodia, a pochi metri dalla città giudiziaria, a Prati. I militanti, davanti al feretro nel sagrato della chiesa, fecero anche il saluto romano gridando ‘presente’. Fatti dai quali donna conosciuta come "Tungs". In seguito all’inchiesta aperta dalla procura di Roma, con il pm Erminio Amelio, gli indagati sono accusati di violazione delle leggi Scelba e Mancino in materia di apologia di fascismo e incitamento alla discriminazione all'odio o alla violenza per motivi razziali, etnici, nazionali o religiosi. Nel corso dell’udienza preliminare di questa mattina il pm ha depositato un’integrazione al capo di imputazione e in particolare in relazione all’articolo 2 della Legge Mancino. L’udienza è stata aggiornata a ottobre.

title: Silvia Poppovic apresenta novo namorado após ficar viúva: 'Torçam pela gente'
content: Nas vésperas do Dia dos Namorados, a apresentadora Silvia Poppovic, de 69 anos, revelou que está com o novo amor. "Nessa semana dos namorados, quero dizer que a vida me presenteou com uma nova oportunidade de amar, ser amada e feliz! Esse é Álvaro Malheiros, meu namorado! Torçam pela gente!", escreveu apresentadora nas redes sociais nesta terça-feira, 11. Silvia foi casada com o médico Marcello Bronstein, que foi diagnosticado com leucemia em setembro de 2021. Em julho do mesmo ano, ele recebeu um transplante de medula óssea da filha do casal, Ana, de 24 anos. Marcello morreu no dia 25 de novembro de 2022 . publicidade

title: Gobierno de Isla Mujeres realiza pruebas gratuitas para detectar el cáncer de próstata
content: Isla Mujeres.- En el marco del Día Mundial del Cáncer de Próstata, el Gobierno Municipal que encabeza la alcaldesa Atenea Gómez Ricalde, a través de la Dirección de Salud, realizará muestras de antígeno prostático gratuitas durante todo el mes de junio en los Centros Comunitarios de ambas zonas del municipio. María Teresa Gómez Herrera, directora de Salud Municipal, destacó que las muestras de antígeno son para hombres de 45 años en adelante y se realizan en un horario de lunes a viernes de 9:00 am a 12 pm en la zona insular y los viernes de 9:00 am a 2:00 pm en la Zona Continental. Gómez Herrera refirió que el cáncer de próstata se considera la primera causa de mortalidad en hombre por tumores malignos; por ello, exhortó a los isleños a acercarse a los consultorios médicos de los Centros Comunitarios para realizarse sus tomas sanguíneas y poder detectar a tiempo este padecimiento. La directora de Salud Municipal agregó que los factores de riesgo del cáncer de...

title: Mașinile pe benzină și motorină ar putea avea viață mai lungă în UE. PPE vrea anularea Green Deal
content: Dreapta reconfigurată nu a pierdut timpul şi a tras primul foc de armă asupra pachetului emblematic de legi ecologice al UE, Green Deal, la câteva minute după ce şi-a proclamat victoria, duminică seara, 9 iunie, în alegerile europene, scrie POLITICO. Astfel, Manfred Weber , şeful grupului de centru-drepta PPE, promite ca în negocierile din zilele următoare să facă presiuni pentru eliminarea interdicţiei privind motoarele cu combustie. În vizor este Interzicerea din 2035 a vânzării de autovehicule cu motoare cu combustie internă - un pilon central al planului de reducere a emisiilor de gaze cu efect de seră pe şoselele Europei, prevăzut în cadrul "Green Deal". Acesta a fost primul lucru menţionat de Manfred Weber, liderul Partidului Popular European (PPE), grupul de centru-dreapta, care a obţinut cele mai multe locuri în Parlamentul European în urma alegerilor. Weber a declarat pentru POLITICO că interdicţia a fost o "greşeală", promiţând că grupul său...

title: Rakenteilla olevalla laivalla syttyi tulipalo Meyerin telakalla – työt joudutaan keskeyttämään ainakin loppupäiväksi
content: Rakenteilla olevassa laivassa syttyi kolmen aikaan iltapäivällä tulipalo Meyerin telakalla Turussa. Tulipalo ei päässyt leviään suureksi ja telakan henkilökunta sai sen sammutettua omatoimisesti. Palo ei aiheuttanut suurta vahinkoa aluksella. Pelastuslaitos joutui kuitenkin tuulettamaan aiheutunutta savua laivan sisällä. – Siellä keskeytettiin työt nyt ainakin tämän päivän osalta. Se on niin sokkeleoinen laiva, että menee hetken aikaa ennen kuin se on saatu täysin savuttomaksi, päivystävä palomestari Timo Lehmuskoski kertoo.

title: В Тверской области загорелся дачный дом
content: В Бежецке Тверской области загорелся дачный дом, сообщение о пожаре поступило дежурному в 16:39. Буквально за полчаса огнеборцы отделений пожарно-спасательной части No 22 ликвидировали возгорание. Пострадавших нет.

title: ФСБ РФ показала золотой пистолет ТТ фигуранта дела о хищении 60 млн рублей в КЧР
creator: Марина Галушка
content: ФСБ опубликовала кадры задержания высокопоставленных чиновников и правоохранителей в Карачаево-Черкесии. На видео можно разглядеть, что у подозреваемых в хищении 60 млн рублей обнаружили множество ценных вещей, в том числе золотой пистолет ТТ. На кадрах видно, как бойцы спецназа перебираются через забор роскошного особняка по лестнице. Также показаны кадры с дорогими автомобилями, крупными суммами денег и коллекцией наручных часов. Напомним, в Карачаево-Черкесии силовики задержали группировку, состоящую из высокопоставленных чиновников и правоохранителей, которая из бюджета похитила около 60 млн рублей, направленных на развитие в республике сельского хозяйства. Следователи возбудили уголовное дело по признакам мошенничества. У членов группы обнаружили и изъяли вещественные доказательства, которые указывают на их противоправную деятельность. Ранее «СП» о том, что задержана глава оккультной организации «Империя сильнейших ведьм» Елена Суликова, она же Алёна Полынь.

title: Hucknall care home residents celebrate D-Day and National Fish & Chips Day in style
creator: John Smith
content: The events included constructing a fish & chip shop within the care home, complete with period-appropriate decorations and vintage costumes. The first day was dedicated to commemorating the 80th anniversary of D-Day. Residents shared personal stories and reflections about World War II, with many having direct connections to the conflict. They organised moments of reflection to ensure the bravery and sacrifices of those who served were properly remembered and respected. On the second day, they shifted focus to National Fish & Chip Day as residents and activities co-ordinators collaborated to create a charming fish & chip shop, reminiscent of traditional chippies from the mid-20th century. After building their chippy, the residents relished the experience of enjoying traditional fish & chips served in a cone with mushy peas and vinegar. It brought back fond memories of visiting the chippy in the old days. They delighted in the familiar flavours and the nostalgic atmosphere, reminiscing...

title: أنشيلوتي: متحمس لبدء الموسم المقبل مع مبابي وإندريك
content: هاي كورة – سُئل للمدرب الإيطالي، كارلو أنشيلوتي، عن مدى شعوره بالحماس للعمل في الموسم المقبل مع وجود كيليان مبابي وإندريك فيليبي في ريال مدريد. و رد أنشيلوتي قائلًا : “نعم متحمس لبدء الموسم مع مبابي وإندريك، عليك دائمًا التكيف مع خصائص اللاعبين القادمين. لقد فقدنا كروس ولكن لدينا فريق شاب وأعتقد أنهم رائعون، لذا علينا التكيف.”

title: SKY express: Στρατηγικές συμμαχίες με 18 κορυφαίους αερομεταφορείς και διασύνδεση της Ελλάδας με περισσότερες από 160 χώρες σε όλο τον κόσμο
creator: Χρήστος Μαζάνης
content: Η SKY express συνεχίζει την ανοδική της πορεία με ενισχυμένο portfolio στρατηγικών interline συνεργασιών με τους μεγαλύτερους παγκόσμιους αερομεταφορείς, δημιουργώντας νέες προοπτικές διασύνδεσης της χώρας και περαιτέρω ενίσχυσης του εθνικού τουριστικού προϊόντος. Ακολουθώντας τα διεθνή πρότυπα και πρακτικές, η SKY express έχει ήδη συνάψει συμφωνίες με 18 αεροπορικές εταιρείες σε όλο τον κόσμο, μεταξύ των οποίων είναι οι: Air France, American Airlines, Air Transat, Air Serbia, British Airways, Condor Airlines, Cyprus Airways, Delta Airlines, Easyjet, El AL Israel Airlines, Emirates, Etihad, KLM, Middle East Airlines, Qatar Airways, Royal Jordanian, Transavia και Turkish Airlines. Μέσα από τις στρατηγικές της συμμαχίες, η SKY express προσφέρει τη δυνατότητα απρόσκοπτης διασύνδεσης με περισσότερες από 160 χώρες σε όλο τον κόσμο. Αξίζει να σημειωθεί ότι, το 2023 ο αριθμός των μηνιαίων πτήσεων των interline partners της εταιρείας...

title: «ألبن كابيتال»: 10 مليارات دولار حجم الضيافة في الإمارات 2028
creator: دار الخليج
content: يُتوقع أن يشهد قطاع الضيافة في دولة الإمارات نمواً بمعدل سنوي قدره 6.9 % ليصل إلى 10 مليارات دولار في العام 2028، مقارنة ب 7.1 مليار دولار في العام 2023، ويُعزى هذا النمو إلى جاذبية الدولة للسياح الدوليين باعتبارها وجهة عالمية للترفيه والأعمال، مدعومة بالبنية التحتية المتطورة لقطاع السياحة، بحسب تقرير «ألبن كابيتال». ووفقاً للتقرير، من المتوقع أن يرتفع عدد السياح الدوليين إلى الإمارات بمعدل سنوي مركب قدره 5.0 % على مدار أربع سنوات ليصل إلى 30.4 مليون سائح في العام 2028. ومن المتوقع أن تشهد الإمارات زيادة في معدل الإشغال تبلغ نسبتها 78.7 % خلال الأعوام 2023 و 2028. ونتيجة لذلك، من المتوقع أن ينمو متوسط السعر اليومي بمعدل سنوي مركب قدره 2.2 % ليصل إلى 161.1 دولار بحلول العام 2028، مقارنة ب 144.5 دولار في العام 2023، بينما يتوقع أن ترتفع إيرادات الغرفة المتوافرة بمعدل سنوي مركب نسبته 3.3 % إلى 126.8 دولار مقارنة ب 107.9 دولار خلال الفترة ذاتها. وقالت سمينا أحمد، العضو المنتدب لدى «ألبن كابيتال» (الشرق الأوسط) المحدودة: «أصبحت دولة الإمارات موقعاً مفضلاً لعقد...

title: La agricultura es el motor del Producto Interno Bruto en Venezuela
creator: martin2
content: La agricultura en Venezuela se ha consolidado como uno de los principales motores económicos del país, contribuyendo significativamente al Producto Interno Bruto (PIB). Según Wilmar Castro Soteldo, ministro para la Agricultura Productiva y Tierras, este sector aporta actualmente el 48% del PIB, lo que lo convierte en un pilar fundamental para la inversión y el desarrollo económico del país. Durante su intervención en el 27o Foro Económico Internacional de San Petersburgo, Rusia, Castro Soteldo destacó el inmenso potencial del sector agrícola venezolano. Este foro, que reúne a 139 delegaciones de diversos países y regiones del mundo, sirvió como plataforma para que el ministro presentara las oportunidades y avances de la agricultura en Venezuela. En su discurso, Castro Soteldo subrayó las políticas económicas implementadas por el presidente Nicolás Maduro, enmarcadas en la creación de Zonas Económicas Especiales Agroalimentarias (ZEEA). Estas zonas comprenden tierras...

title: El Ministerio formaliza por 731.808 euros la redacción del estudio para remodelar la red ferroviaria próxima a Zaragoza
content: El Ministerio de Transportes y Movilidad Sostenible ha formalizado por 731.808 euros --IVA incluido-- el contrato para la redacción del estudio funcional para la remodelación de la red arterial ferroviaria del entorno de Zaragoza y su adaptación a las circulaciones de la línea Zaragoza-Canfranc-Pau, tal y como ha publicado este martes 11 de junio la Plataforma de Contratación del Estado. El estudio lo llevará a cabo la empresa Idom Consulting, Engineering, Architecture, S.A.U. y tiene por objeto caracterizar la problemática existente en la red arterial ferroviaria de Zaragoza y la que pudiera generarse a futuro como consecuencia de las actuaciones que se están ejecutando y planificando en ese entorno. Asimismo, se llevará a cabo un análisis de las necesidades de remodelación y de las distintas posibilidades de actuación en la red arterial que contribuyan a paliar los problemas detectados y a adaptarse a las futuras necesidades de circulación, estimando la inversión...

title: ‘How dare he’: Sunak claims the Tories have reduced child poverty – but it’s not exactly the truth
creator: Isabella McRae
content: Rishi Sunak suggested that the Conservative government has “reduced child poverty ” as he announced his party’s manifesto ahead of the general election. At a time when millions of children across the country are living in poverty and hundreds of thousands of people are relying on food banks to live, it’s no surprise his comment made at Silverstone on Tuesday (11 June) have provoked outrage. Caroline Lucas, former leader of the Green Party, posted on X: “How dare Sunak suggest the Tories have reduced child poverty.” Taxes, benefit cuts and bad jokes: Key takeaways from the Tory general election manifesto launch ‘You can hear your stomach growling’: Kids call on next government to do more to end child poverty Around one million children in the UK experienced “horrifying levels of destitution” last year, according to the Joseph Rowntree Foundation. title: LA ROVINA DELLE FIGLIE SONO LE MADRI – I CHIRURGHI ESTETICI RIVELANO COME A SPINGERE LE 18ENNI A RIFARSI IL SENO SIANO PROPRIO LE MADRI, MOLTE DELLE QUALI MAGARI GIA' PASSATE SOTTO LA PIALLA PER STIRARE LE RUGHE – I SOCIAL NON AIUTANO, VISTO CHE MOSTRANO SOLO VIDEO E FOTO DI ZINNONE AL VENTO - MOLTE RAGAZZE CHIEDONO L’INTERVENTO ALLE POPPE COME REGALO PER I 18 ANNI, MA POI SE NE PENTONO DOPO POCHI ANNI: UN INTERVENTO SU QUATTRO, A TUTTE LE ETÀ, FINISCE CON UN RIPENSAMENTO E...
content: LA ROVINA DELLE FIGLIE SONO LE MADRI La piattaforma ideale per pubblicare gli scatti prima e dopo è Instagram. Il passaparola sul chirurgo migliore viaggia invece su TikTok. Il motore di ricerca di Google serve a trovare la clinica più vicina (in Svizzera) o più economica (Turchia) qualora si fosse ancora minorenni. Qualunque sia la situazione, il matrimonio fra social media e chirurgia estetica è perfetto. E sta facendo aumentare gli interventi di protesi al seno. Avviene in Italia, dove il ministero della Salute ha sentito il bisogno di emanare una circolare per ribadire i punti della legge del 2012: gli interventi di chirurgia estetica sulle ragazze minorenni sono vietati. Il medico che infrange la legge rischia 20mila euro di multa e tre mesi di sospensione dalla professione. La Sime — Società Italiana di Medicina Estetica — ha criticato un'abitudine diffusa tra i genitori: regalare alla figlia un intervento di chirurgia estetica per il 18esimo compleanno: «È solo una moda...

title: Сергей РЕБРОВ: «Последний матч. Нужно показать, что Украина готова к Евро»
content: Тренер сборной Украины Сергей Ребров перед контрольным матчем с Молдовой коротко оценил последнюю игру команды перед Евро-2024. «Это последний матч. Игроки должны показать свой уровень. Я считаю, что мы подготовились, и это нужно показать и каждому игроку, и команде в целом». «Говорят, результат не имеет значения, но это важно, это добавит уверенности. Не на первом плане результат, но нужно проверить готовность перед Евро», – сказал Ребров. На Евро Украина стартует 17 июня.

title: Book Review: Yume Kitasei explores space in a heist-driven action adventure novel
creator: Donna Edwards, The Associated Press
content: Grad student Maya Hoshimoto is having a hard time settling down on Earth after a thrilling career as an art thief, stealing looted objects and returning them to their people. So when her best friend Auncle — an octopus-like being from another solar system — offers one last job, of course she says yes. But we all know it’s never simply one last job. “The Stardust Grail” is Yume Kitasei’s second novel, another thrilling space adventure featuring strong women and diverse characters. As in her first novel, “The Deep Sky,” Kitasei uses sci-fi to recontextualize issues that have been banging around your brain with no easy answers — like what determines personhood and whether artificial intelligence can obtain it, or when cultural adaptation becomes appropriation or oppression. Maya believes she can find the Stardust Grail, which could be the secret to allowing Auncle to reproduce and preserve the Frenro species. She had sworn her days of stealing and repatriating artifacts were over, but...

title: Timnas Indonesia Lolos ke Putaran 3 Kualifikasi Piala Dunia 2026, Jokowi: Ini Sejarah
content: Presiden Joko Widodo atau Jokowi bangga dengan yang berhasil mengalahkan Filipina dengan skor 2-0, dalam laga pamungkas Grup F putaran kedua kualifikasi Piala Dunia 2026 zona Asia di Stadion Utama Gelora Bung Karno (GBK) Jakarta, Selasa (11/6/2024). Kemenangan ini membuat Timnas Indonesia lolos ke putaran tiga Kualifikasi zona Asia dari Grup F. Jokowi mengatakan, prestasi yang diraih Timnas Indonesia merupakan sejarah. Baca Juga "Ya saya kira seluruh masyarakat pecinta sepakbola senang semua karena lolos dan bisa masuk ke ronde 3 kualifikasi sistem FIFA yang baru. Ini adalah sebuah sejarah dan kita dengan sistem baru ini kita pertama masuk," kata dia kepada wartawan usai menyaksikan pertandingan Indonesia vs Filipina di Stadion Utama GBK Jakarta, Selasa (11/6/2024). Advertisement Jokowi pun bersyukur kemenangan tersebut mengantarkan Timnas Indonesia lolos ke putaran final Piala Asia 2027. Jokowi pun memuji para pemain Timnas Indonesia yang bermain bagus. "Ya semua kita syukuri yang...

title: Έως τις 21 Ιουνίου οι αιτήσεις συμμετοχής στο ΟΠΑΠ Forward
creator: Μπάμπης Παπαφιλιππάκης
content: Δέκα ημέρες έχουν απομείνει για την υποβολή αιτήσεων συμμετοχής στο ΟΠΑΠ Forward, το κορυφαίο πρόγραμμα επιχειρηματικότητας στην Ελλάδα. Οι μικρομεσαίες επιχειρήσεις που επιθυμούν να ενταχθούν στον 7 ο κύκλο του ΟΠΑΠ Forward μπορούν να υποβάλουν ηλεκτρονικά τις αιτήσεις τους μέσω του website Εταιρικής Υπευθυνότητας του ΟΠΑΠ www.opapcsr.gr , στο οποίο είναι διαθέσιμες και όλες οι πληροφορίες του προγράμματος. Εργαλείο ανάπτυξης για τις μικρομεσαίες επιχειρήσεις Το ΟΠΑΠ Forward υποστηρίζει δυναμικές, μικρομεσαίες εταιρείες που θέλουν να αναπτυχθούν, να αυξήσουν την παραγωγικότητά τους, τον τζίρο τους και να δημιουργήσουν νέες θέσεις εργασίας. title: Absolute Power: Ground Zero kicks off DC's summer event with three new stories - and the return of a long-dead character
creator: william.salmon@futurenet.com (Will Salmon)
content: DC's big summer event unites three villains - Amanda Waller, , and Braniac - as they forge an unholy alliance that will have far-reaching consequences for all the DC superheroes. The event kicks off with Absolute Power: Ground Zero - a new one-shot that hits comic shops on June 25. We've read the issue and while we can't get into specifics, we can say that it is told in three distinct 'stages,' each one focusing on a different character. 'Stage 2' of the issue is co-written by Batman's current lead-writer and the legendary , and drawn by V Ken Marion with colors by Patricio Delpeche. The chapter hones in on Amanda Waller who has grown into one of the most powerful figures in the DC universe. Zdarsky took time to answer a few of our questions about the new issue and how he feels about comic crossovers as a whole. Great! We talked through what we needed to accomplish with the story and then I went off and wrote a draft. And then Mark came back in and showed me how to really write it and...

title: Єврокомісія пропонує продовжити захист українських біженців
content: Про це йдеться в заяві Єврокомісії. Стверджується, що через продовження російських атак на цивільну й критичну інфраструктуру в Україні наразі немає безпечних та довготривалих умов для повернення біженців додому. У Єврокомісії наголошують, що кінцевою метою є забезпечення усіх втікачів від російської агресії якомога більшою стабільністю, зокрема й тих 4,2 млн людей, що вже користуються тимчасовим захистом в державах-членах ЄС. Комісія представить пропозицію міністрам на засіданні Ради з питань юстиції та внутрішніх справ 13 червня. Після цього Рада має офіційно ухвалити пропозицію.

title: Border strike averted after union reaches tentative agreement with Ottawa
creator: Canadian Press
content: OTTAWA — Workers at Canada's borders won't go on strike this week, after their union reached a tentative agreement with the federal government. The Public Service Alliance of Canada says it's reached a deal with the government after working "around the clock." Its 9,000 members who work for the Canada Border Services Agency had been set to strike at 12:01 a.m. Friday if they couldn't reach an agreement. A similar strike three years ago nearly brought commercial border traffic to a standstill and caused major delays across the country. The union says details of the tentative agreement will be released after they're shared with members on Thursday. Union members still need to vote to ratify the deal. This report from The Canadian Press was first published June 11, 2024. The Canadian Press

title: سنت عود سوزی به ۴ روش در حرم مطهر رضوی اجرا می‌شود
content: به گزارش ، محمد توکلی فریمانی ظهر سه شنبه در آئین رونمایی از اسناد چهارصد ساله مراسم عود سوزی در حرم مطهر رضوی با اشاره به پیشینه فعالیت‌های صورت گرفته برای حرم مطهر رضوی، اظهار کرد: موضوع خوشبویی اماکن مذهبی امری مهم در تمام مذاهب، ملیت‌ها و قومیت . مشاور مدیر عالی حرم مطهر رضوی با اشاره به اینکه در فرهنگ ایرانی اسلامی نیز دو عنصر گلاب و عود برای خوشبویی استفاده شده است، گفت: در این خصوص شهرستان میمند در استان فارس که در اوایل قرن ۳ به استخراج گلاب از گل محمدی پرداخت در دنیا پیشرو است. وی بیان کرد: همیشه بهترین‌ها از اسباب خوشبو کننده در حرم امام رضا ( استفاده می‌شود و در حال حاضر نیز به ۴ روش این سنت عود سوزی و در حرم اجرا می‌شود. توکلی فریمانی اظهار کرد: عود سوزی در واحد تشریفات صحن‌ها و بست‌های ورودی گلاب در مناسبت‌های مختلف صورت می‌گیرد؛ این آئین به سپرده شده که با عود مخصوص در حرم مطهر در مسیرهای تشرف انجام می‌شود. مشاور حرم مطهر رضوی بیان کرد: از ترکیبات اسفند، و گلپر در گذشته برای عود سوزی استفاده می‌شد. امروز صد نوع ماده معطر را استخراج و با نسبت‌های مختلف ترکیب می‌کنیم...

title: Με σαρδόνιο χαμόγελο απάντησε ο πρωθυπουργός στις αναφορές για ανασχηματισμό
creator: Ελένη Δρίβα
content: Με ένα πλατύ, αλλά σαρδόνιο χαμόγελο και πολλές υπεκφυγές ο Κυριάκος Μητσοτάκης τοποθετήθηκε στο ερώτημα που του υπέβαλε ο Αντώνης Σρόιτερ σχετικά με τον αναμενόμενο ανασχηματισμό. «Εσείς μου απευθύνατε ένα ερώτημα που έπρεπε να μου το απευθύνετε και εγώ σας απαντώ με τον τρόπο που πρέπει να σας απαντήσω», είπε ο πρωθυπουργός και ο νοών νοείτω. Όσον αφορά τα υπόλοιπα ζητήματα που έχουν ανακύψει μετά το αποτέλεσμα των ευρωεκλογών, ο Κυριάκος Μητσοτάκης δήλωσε τα εξής: « Ήταν μια δύσκολη προεκλογική εκστρατεία, κουραστική, πιστεύω ότι έδωσα τον καλύτερό μου εαυτό. Θέλω να πω ένα μεγάλο ευχαριστώ στους συνεργάτες μου, στα στελέχη μας στον κομματικό μας μηχανισμό για τον αγώνα που έκαναν. Σίγουρα το αποτέλεσμα δεν ήταν αυτό που περιμέναμε και αυτό με κάνει ταυτόχρονα να είμαι προβληματισμένος και με ένα παράξενο τρόπο ανακουφισμένος. Είναι γιατί πιστεύω πάντα στη σοφία του ελληνικού λαού. Αν ο λαός...

title: BYD mit sieben Modellen in Österreich
content: BYD hat mittlerweile ein breites Angebot in Europa, der Seal ist eine Limousine, die Ähnlichkeiten mit Tesla aufweist. REUTERS/Claudia Greco Der chinesische Autohersteller BYD ist seit Jänner 2023 am österreichischen Markt vertreten. 2023 wurden insgesamt 1024 BYD-Fahrzeuge in Österreich angemeldet, heuer wurde diese Zahl im Verkauf bereits übertroffen.

title: رشد تراکنش‌های تجارت الکترونیکی در سال ۱۴۰۲
content: به گزارش ، رضا باقری اصل معاون امور دولت، مجلس و استان‌های وزارت ارتباطات در شبکه اجتماعی ویراستی گفت: رشد چشمگیر تراکنش‌های تجارت الکترونیکی در سال ۱۴۰۲، نشان‌دهنده توسعه اقتصاد دیجیتال با محوریت بخش خصوصی و حمایت ویژه دولت از این بخش مهم اقتصادی است. وی افزود: افزایش ۷۴ درصدی ارزش تراکنش‌ها و ۳۰.۶ درصدی تعداد در حالی است که شاخص‌های متناظر در شاپرک ۳۳ درصد ارزش و ۱۰ درصد تعداد در این سال رشد داشته است.

title: 36 jogadores nos torneios de xadrez Abraço Verde
creator: Redação
content: A Associação Peão Cavalgante realizou no dia 1 de junho dois torneios de xadrez, um aberto e outro em simultâneo para os mais jovens até aos sub12, no Abraço Verde, nas Caldas da Rainha. Participaram 36 jogadores, sendo 23 no aberto e 13 jovens nos sub12. O vice-presidente da Câmara Municipal das Caldas da Rainha, Joaquim Beato, esteve presente na cerimónia de entrega de prémios. Caio Mota (Associação Peão Cavalgante/Arneirense) venceu o I Torneio de Xadrez Abraço Verde sub12 só com vitórias. O caldense Artur Guia (Ferroviários do Barreiro) vence o I Torneio de Xadrez Abraço Verde, também só com vitórias.

title: World: हंटर बिडेन को ऐतिहासिक संघीय बंदूक परीक्षण में सभी आपराधिक आरोपों में दोषी पाया गया
creator: Ayush Kumar
content: World: हंटर बिडेन को 2018 में रिवॉल्वर की खरीद से संबंधित सभी तीन गुंडागर्दी के आरोपों में दोषी ठहराया गया है, जब अभियोजकों ने तर्क दिया था कि राष्ट्रपति के बेटे ने अनिवार्य बंदूक-खरीद फॉर्म पर झूठ बोला था कि वह अवैध रूप से ड्रग्स का उपयोग नहीं कर रहा था या नशे का आदी नहीं था। जूरी ने हंटर बिडेन को संघीय लाइसेंस प्राप्त बंदूक डीलर से झूठ बोलने, आवेदन पर झूठा दावा करने और यह कहकर दोषी पाया कि वह ड्रग उपयोगकर्ता नहीं था और उसके पास 11 दिनों तक अवैध रूप से बंदूक थी। फैसला सुनाए जाने के दौरान वह सीधे आगे देखता रहा और उसने कोई भावना नहीं दिखाई। फैसले के बाद, उसने अपने बचाव पक्ष के वकील के कंधे पर थपथपाया। जज मैरीलेन नोरिका द्वारा सजा सुनाए जाने पर उसे 25 साल तक की जेल हो सकती है, हालांकि पहली बार अपराध करने वालों को अधिकतम सजा नहीं मिलती है, और यह स्पष्ट नहीं है कि वह उसे सलाखों के पीछे समय देगी या नहीं। अब, हंटर बिडेन और संभावित रिपब्लिकन राष्ट्रपति पद के उम्मीदवार डोनाल्ड ट्रम्प, राष्ट्रपति जो बिडेन के मुख्य राजनीतिक प्रतिद्वंद्वी, को अमेरिकी जूरी द्वारा एक चुनावी वर्ष में दोषी ठहराया...

title: Hunter Biden found guilty of illegally owning gun, lying about drug use
creator: Farrah Tomazin
content: Washington : President Joe Biden’s troubled son Hunter has been convicted for gun crimes and now faces the prospect of a jail sentence while his father campaigns for one of the most consequential elections in US history. In another court case that could shake the 2024 rematch between the incumbent president and Donald Trump, Hunter Biden has been found guilty of illegally owning a gun and lying about his drug use on a form he filled out to purchase the firearm in 2018. Hunter Biden arrives to federal court with his wife, Melissa Cohen Biden, on Tuesday. Credit: AP The verdict, delivered by a jury after three hours of deliberations, marks the first time the child of a US president has been convicted of a felony – and one that comes with a maximum sentence of 25 years’ prison, although a lesser sentence is far more likely. He also faces a separate trial in September – two months before the November election – on more serious charges relating to his alleged failure to pay $US1.4 million...

title: G7 "trolled" Putin: a fund for Ukraine's recovery will be created with Kremlin's money
content: The Group of Seven (G7) countries have agreed to set up a fund to support Ukraine , which will receive proceeds from frozen Russian assets. There will be no need to return the funds. According to Nikkei , the fund will be created under the auspices of an international organization, such as the World Bank. The United States, the United Kingdom, Japan, Germany, Canada, France, and Italy will make contributions in the form of loans. At the same time, Ukraine will not return the money received , as it will be provided in the form of donations. The fund's loans will be repaid with funds received from the profits from the investment of frozen assets . The decision of the Group of Seven is to be officially announced in a joint statement by the leaders of the G7 member states following the summit, which will begin in Italy on June 13. First Deputy Chairman of the Verkhovna Rada Tax Committee Yaroslav Zhelezniak (Holos) called it good news for Ukraine. He especially emphasized that the...

title: Poesie e messaggi per Michelle: il liceo Gassman ricorda la giovane uccisa a Primavalle
content: Il Liceo Gassman non dimentica Michelle. Infatti in occasione della fine dell’anno scolastico gli ex compagni e gli studenti della scuola del quattordicesimo municipio hanno infatti ricordato la 17enne uccisa a coltellate da un suo lo scorso 28 giugno 2023 a Primavalle. Non gavettoni e giochi, nemmeno , ma tutta la scuola dalle studentesse agli studenti fino al personale scolastico ha fatto cerchio per ricordare la ragazza. Tutti si sono recati al Parco Dominique Green dove con momenti di silenzio, striscioni (“Mai più vittime nei nostri quartieri”), letture di poesie e lancio simbolico di palloncini con messaggi (“Ci manchi”, ndr) hanno dedicato un pensiero a Michelle per il primo anno scolastico trascorso senza di lei. "Un momento di grande tenerezza e grande dolore negli occhi dei compagni e compagne di classe di Michelle. Come Istituzione Municipale abbiamo garantito la presenza per ricordare questa tragedia senza senso e portare la nostra vicinanza alla comunità scolastica...

title: 4,000-year-old Cretan hilltop mystifies Greek archaeologists. It could spell trouble for new airport
creator: Nicholas Paphitis, The Associated Press
content: ATHENS, Greece (AP) — A big, round, 4,000-year-old stone building discovered on a Cretan hilltop is puzzling archaeologists and threatening to disrupt a major airport project on the Greek tourist island. Greece's Culture Ministry said Tuesday that the structure is a “unique and extremely interesting find” from Crete's Minoan civilization, famous for its sumptuous palaces, flamboyant art and enigmatic writing system. Resembling a huge car wheel from above, the ruins of the labyrinthine, 1,800-square-meter (19,000-square-foot) building came to light during a recent dig by archaeologists. The site was earmarked for a radar station to serve a new airport under construction near the town of Kastelli. Set to open in 2027, it's projected to replace Greece's second-biggest airport at Heraklion, and designed to handle up to 18 million travellers annually. Archaeologists don't yet know what the hilltop structure was for. It's still under excavation and has no known Minoan parallels. So for the...

title: President Joe Biden's son, Hunter Biden, is convicted of all 3 felonies in federal gun trial
creator: Randall Chase, Claudia Lauer, Michael Kunzelman And Alanna Durkin Richer, The Associated Press
content: WILMINGTON, Del. (AP) — Hunter Biden was convicted Tuesday of all three felony charges related to the purchase of a revolver in 2018 when , prosecutors argued, the president’s son lied on a mandatory gun-purchase form by saying he was not illegally using or addicted to drugs. Jurors found Hunter Biden guilty of lying to a federally licensed gun dealer, making a false claim on the application by saying he was not a drug user and illegally having the gun for 11 days. The jury in Wilmington, Delaware, deliberated for about three hours over two days. Hunter Biden started straight ahead and showed little emotion as the verdict was read. After the verdict, he hugged both of his attorneys and smiled wanly. He kissed his wife, Melissa, and they left the courtroom together. First lady Jill Biden arrived at the courthouse minutes after the jury delivered its verdict and was not in the courtroom when it was read. He faces up to 25 years in prison when he is sentenced by Judge Maryellen Noreika,...

title: خبراء ومصممو سياسات: دبي بيئة ممكّنة لرواد الأعمال وشركات الذكاء الاصطناعي الواعدة
creator: وام

title: Nabi can only start his preseason at Kaizer Chiefs on this DATE!!!
creator: Eliot Mahlase
content: Tunisian coach Nasreddine Nabi is reportedly set to become Kaizer Chiefs’ next coach. The 58-year-old is currently coaching Moroccan giants FAR Rabat. With his contract set to expire only in 2025, why would the former Yanga FC coach leave after just less than one year with the club? Kaizer Chiefs and Nabi had talks last year with this team but both parties failed to agree on a deal. The Tunisian coach later revealed the deal fell off after Amakhosi refused to allow him to bring his own technical team. With the Soweto Giants now looking for a new coach yet again, Nabi is top of their list . Soccer Laduma reported last week that FAR Rabat had given the green light for Nabi to join the Glamour Boys. “Nasreddine Nabi’s current employers, Botola Pro giants FAR Rabat, have reportedly green-lit the Tunisian’s departure amid speculation linking him with Kaizer Chiefs. “According to Moroccan news outlet Biladna 24 , the reigning league champions, Nabi and Chiefs have all reached an agreement...

title: شهرداری گرگان با پرش از مانع ژاپنی به نیمه نهایی رسید
content: به گزارش ، عصر سه شنبه تیم‌های شهرداری گرگان و هیروشیما ژاپن در سالن شیخ سعید بن مکتوم دبی امارات به مصاف هم رفتند. در این دیدارها شهرداری گرگان ۹۴ و هیروشیما (ژاپن) ۸۱ امتیاز به دست آوردند. شهرداری گرگان در گروه دوم با تیم‌های هیروشیما ژاپن، کی‌سی‌سی کره جنوبی و اندونزی همگروه بوده و در بازی نخست مقابل نماینده کره جنوبی به برتری رسید اما در بازی دوم مغلوب نماینده اندونزی شد. نماینده بسکتبال ایران به عنوان یکی از دو تیم برتر گروه به مرحله نیمه نهایی راه یافت.

title: House of the Dragon season 2 showrunner on why Blood and Cheese is nothing like Game of Thrones' Red Wedding
creator: molly.edwards@futurenet.com (Molly Edwards)

But the reason the Red Wedding was great was because it was shocking, but it also eliminated these two people you saw as – and certainly once Ned Stark died – you saw Cat...

title: Handel: Verbraucher kaufen weniger Spirituosen
creator: dpa
content: Das Sparen beim Wocheneinkauf macht sich auch bei den Spirituosen-Herstellern bemerkbar. Der Umsatz ist im Jahr 2023 zwar leicht gestiegen, der Pro-Kopf-Konsum jedoch rückläufig. Bonn - Viele Verbraucherinnen und Verbraucher in sparen beim Wocheneinkauf - auch bei . Die Absatzmenge von hochprozentigen alkoholischen Getränken im -Einzelhandel ist 2023 im Vergleich zum Vorjahr um vier Prozent gesunken. Das gab der Bundesverband der Deutschen Spirituosen-Industrie und -Importeure (BSI) bekannt. Beim Umsatz verzeichnete die Branche zwar ein kleines Plus von 1,4 Prozent. Dies ist jedoch vor allem auf die inflationsbedingt gestiegenen Preise zurückzuführen. Die Zahlen stützen sich auf Daten des Marktforschungsinstituts NIQ. 0,1 Liter weniger Pro Kopf Der jährliche Pro-Kopf-Verbrauch von Spirituosen ging im vergangenen Jahr nach Angaben des Verbandes um 0,1 Liter und knapp zwei Prozent zurück. title: Kursy walut. Ile kosztują dolar, euro i frank szwajcarski we wtorek, 11 czerwca?
content: We wtorek 11 czerwca około godziny 17.18 był wyceniany na niecałe Amerykańska waluta zyskiwała wobec złotego 0,71 proc. Za jedno trzeba było zapłacić Wspólna waluta umacniała się o 0,34 proc. wobec polskiej. kosztował Zyskiwał 0,37 proc. wobec złotego. Złoty był więc słabszy niż w poniedziałek wieczorem. 10 czerwca około godz. 19.00 wyceniane było na 4,32 zł, kosztował 4,02 zł, a 4,48 zł. w Interii, polską walutę ciągną w dół korzystne trendy w gospodarce Stanów Zjednoczonych. Dobra sytuacja gospodarki USA wzmocniła dolara. Nasza waluta dostała także rykoszetem po wyborach do Parlamentu Europejskiego - komentował we wtorek popołudniu analityk Domu Maklerskiego BOŚ Konrad Ryczko. "Euro spadło we wtorek do najniższego poziomu od miesiąca, obciążone obawami natury politycznej (...). Wspólna waluta straciła na wartości już w poniedziałek, pod presją obaw inwestorów, że zyski eurosceptyków w wyborach europejskich oraz ogłoszenie przyspieszonych wyborów we Francji...

title: Sinn Féin ‘won’t win the fifth seat’ in Midlands North West – Gildernew
creator: Robert Kindregan
content: Sinn Féin “won’t win the fifth seat” in Midlands North West (MNW), according to Michelle Gildernew. The MP for Fermanagh and South Tyrone is currently just over 12,000 votes behind former RTE correspondent Ciarán Mullooly. Topping the poll in MNW is Luke ‘Ming’ Flanagan, who is set to secure his third consecutive term in Brussels, followed by Maria Walsh and Nina Carberry. Early predictions for the five-seater constituency, which covers 15 counties, expected Sinn Féin to return their seat there, held by Chris McManus. However, Ms Gildernew said this now seems unlikely. “We’re still in the mix but I’m probably not overly optimistic that I can overtake Ciaran Mullooly at this stage,” she said. “I think he’s probably going to scrape the last seat. “I think we have probably resigned to the fact at this stage that we won’t win the fifth seat.” Midlands North West count six results: National Party leader Justin Barret has been eliminated and his votes will be shared among remaining...

title: Syn prezydenta USA uznany za winnego
content: Ława przysięgłych w sądzie federalnym w Wilmington w stanie Delaware podjęła jednomyślną decyzję w sprawie werdyktu po trzech godzinach obrad. Teraz o karze zdecyduje prowadząca proces sędzia Maryellen Noreika. Za postawione Bidenowi zarzuty grozi mu do 25 lat więzienia, lecz eksperci spodziewają się znacznie łagodniejszej kary, biorąc pod uwagę czystą kartotekę skazanego i fakt, że nie doszło do innego poważnego przestępstwa.

title: Declaran culpable a Hunter Biden de todos los cargos en el caso de arma de fuego
creator: Redacción
content: El hijo del presidente Joe Biden, Hunter Biden, fue declarado culpable por el jurado de Delaware de compra de arma de fuego cuando consumía drogas. Hunter Biden se enfrentaba a tres cargos en el juicio por la compra de un arma de fuego en 2018, cuando, explicaron los fiscales, "estaba consumido en una adicción al crack". Los miembros del jurado comenzaron a deliberar el lunes y concretaron el veredicto de culpabilidad de Hunter este martes 11 de junio. “Él sabía que usaba drogas. Eso es lo que demuestran las pruebas. Y sabía que era adicto a las drogas. Eso es lo que demuestran las pruebas”, afirmó al jurado el fiscal, Leo Wise, el lunes durante sus alegatos finales. Caso de Hunter Biden El caso de la fiscalía se basó en gran medida en los testimonios de la exmujer de Hunter Biden y de varias exnovias. Presentaron pruebas fotográficas y relatos detallados de su adicción a las drogas, señalando en particular su supuesta declaración falsa en un formulario de compra de armas,...

title: LNCT INDORE BTech की छात्रा ने सुसाइड कर लिया, बुरहानपुर की टॉपर थी
creator: noreply@blogger.com (Bhopal Samachar)
content: वह बुरहानपुर की रहने वाली थी। टॉप किया था इसलिए स्कॉलरशिप मिली थी। सफलता के शिखर तक पहुंचाने के लिए बुरहानपुर से इंदौर आ गई थी। LNCT COLLEGE में एडमिशन मिला था। BTech की पढ़ाई कर रही थी। साथ में जॉब भी कर रही थी। 13 जून से परीक्षा शुरू होने वाली थी, लेकिन परीक्षा में शामिल होने से पहले ही उसने सुसाइड कर लिया। पुलिस इन्वेस्टिगेशन में इस बात का कभी पता नहीं लगाया जाएगा कि, इंदौर आने के बाद उसकी लाइफ में ऐसा क्या बदल गया जो सफलता की तरफ बढ़ रही लड़की को सुसाइड करने पर मजबूर कर गया। लड़की का नाम वैष्णवी चौहान था। घटना सोमवार शाम की है। हीरा नगर टीआई पीएल शर्मा ने बताया, वैष्णवी चौहान का शव कमरे में लटका मिला है। वह बुरहानपुर की रहने वाली है। इंदौर में किराए के मकान में रह रही थी। वैष्णवी एलएनसीटी कॉलेज में बीटेक सेकंड ईयर की छात्रा थी। उसके रूम से सुसाइड नोट मिला है, जिसमें लिखा है - अब सबसे विदा लेने का वक्त आ गया है। मैं सबकी उम्मीदों पर खरी नहीं उतर पाई। जो मुझे बनना था वह नहीं बन पाई। मां-पिता, भाई, मौसी माफ कर देना। वैष्णवी के पिता सोमवार रात को ही इंदौर पहुंचे और सीधे बेटी के कमरे...

title: Nagpur man falls prey to online trading scam, loses Rs 87 lakh in just 10 days
creator: Tirtho Banerjee
content: The 41-year-old victim, Manish Mishra, was lured into investing and assured by the scamster that he would make a profit of Rs 8 crore. New Delhi : There has been a spurt in online trading scams of late as conmen use new ways to trick victims into investing money in stocks while promising high returns. But, rather than real investments, the victims are duped into investing on fake websites and their invested money is lost forever. In the latest case, a Nagpur businessman lost Rs 87 lakh in the name of investing at the New York Stock Exchange to a fake online platform, a TOI report said. The 41-year-old victim, Manish Mishra, was lured into investing and assured by the scamster that he would make a profit of Rs 8 crore. However, he lost Rs 87 lakh in a span of only 10 days. The man has lodged a complaint with the Lakadganj police station. It all started when Mishra got a friend request on Facebook from the accused Jesleen Prasad. Prasad asked Mishra to start trading in the New York...

title: Türkiye, Bulgaristan ve Romanya birlikte Karadeniz'de mayın temizleyecek
content: 'nin Bükreş Büyükelçisi Özgür Kıvanç Altan, Trakya Üniversitesi ev sahipliğinde düzenlenen "Romanya Günleri" etkinliğinde Türkiye ve Romanya'nın dost ve müttefik iki ülke olduğunu söyledi. İki ülke arasında çok sıkı askeri ilişkiler olduğunu belirten Altan, "NATO içinde beraber çalışıyoruz. Birçok tatbikatı birlikte icra ediyoruz. 4 F-16 savaş uçağımız Romanya hava sahasını 4 ay boyunca korudu. Bunu herkese yapmayız, her ülke için pilotlarımızı göndermeyiz. Ama Romanya için bunu seve seve yaptık ve yine yapacağız." dedi. Karadeniz'in güvenliğinin sağlanmasını önemsediklerini dile getiren Altan, "Temmuz ayında Allah'ın izniyle Türk, Romen ve Bulgar savaş gemileri Karadeniz'deki mayın tehdidine karşı birlikte bir harekat başlatacaklar. Her ülkeyle bunu yapamazsınız. Gerçekten yakın olduğunuz ülkelerle, stratejik ortak olarak gördüğünüz ülkelerle yapabilirsiniz. title: Borsa günü yükselişle tamamladı
content: BIST 100 endeksi, önceki kapanışa göre 53,46 puan artarken, toplam işlem hacmi 92,6 milyar lira oldu. endeksi yüzde 3,15, holding endeksi yüzde 0,57 değer kazandı. Sektör endeksleri arasında en çok kazandıran bankacılık, en çok kaybettiren yüzde 2,87 ile iletişim oldu. Analistler, küresel pay piyasalarında, Merkez Bankası'nın (Fed) yarınki para politikası kararları ve ABD'de açıklanacak verileri öncesinde temkinli bir seyir izlendiğini ifade etti. Yarın Fed'in kararının yanı sıra ABD'de, Almanya'da, Çin'de enflasyon, İngiltere'de sanayi üretimi, Japonya'da Üretici Fiyat Endeksi (ÜFE) ve ABD'de hazine bütçe dengesinin takip edileceğini dile getiren analistler, Fed'in para politikası toplantılarında faizi sabit bırakmasına kesin gözüyle bakıldığını aktardı. Fed'in yarın açıklanacak kararının ardından banka başkanı Jerome Powell'ın sözle yönlendirmelerinin yanı sıra bankanın yayımlayacağı "nokta grafiği"nde olası faiz indirimlerinin boyutu ve...
